programme.title: Morphle - Funny Adventures
programme.desc: Morphle - Funny Adventures

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Detective Baby Shark - When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep705
programme.desc: Pups Save a Waiter-Bot / Pups Stop a Pie-Clone - Mr. Porter's high tech waiter robot helps around the café, but it can't stop cleaning! It's up to the Pups to clean up the mess all over town! // Mayor Humdinger creates a cyclone of delicious pies! The Pups must stop it before the town is covered.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt - Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm. // There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Pottery - Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Gym Class - Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where at first they think all the stuff to do is scary, but Grampy Rabbit tells the kids about how he explored a jungle, helping the kids get over their fears.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep244
programme.desc: The Toy Cupboard - Peppa and George's toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys. Mummy Pig orders a new toy cupboard, but it needs to be assembled – and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not good at DIY.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep232
programme.desc: Ice Skating - Peppa and George are going ice-skating for the first time. Mummy Pig teaches Peppa to skate and soon she is having lots of fun. Peppa begins to teach George how to skate but it turns out he is a natural born skater. Peppa and George love ice-skating.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep229
programme.desc: Painting - Peppa and George are painting. Daddy shows them how to mix paints and the three of them paint a beautiful picture of a cherry tree. Everything is going very well, until the ducks turn up and decide to run through the paint and all over the painting.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Whistling - Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep226
programme.desc: The Eye Test - Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision – but that doesn’t stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep326
programme.desc: Digging Up the Road - Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks are in the way.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep224
programme.desc: The Balloon Ride - Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school: a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Swimming - Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. Rebecca Rabbit is there too. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to discover that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving. Very good indeed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep213
programme.desc: The Time Capsule - Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rongisõit - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Teddy's Day Out - Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zoë Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When it’s home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep248
programme.desc: Bouncy Ball - Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets. She uses the bouncy ball to play a game of tennis with Peppa, making George feel left out. Will the job of ball boy cheer him up?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Bubbles - Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water. Then he makes a big, muddy, bubbly puddle for everyone to jump up and down in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: When You Wish Upon a Fish / Shark-Off - Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Cosmic Circus/A Hole Lot of Trouble - Sir Steel's circus takes Lady Fluffpot out of this world, can the Deer Squad bring her back to earth safely? // Bobbi gets carried away while digging for ground nuts and puts the forest and its residents in real danger.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure - Mrs. Brown can't find inspiration for her next art work so Paddington decides to help find her mojo! // Jonathan and Paddington dig up some broken pottery that turns out to be a statue made by Mrs. Brown. But who broke it?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Paddington Clowns Around - Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Treasure Track - Blaze, AJ, and Gabby join Pegwheel the Pirate-Truck for an island treasure hunt! Following their treasure map, the friends search jungle beaches and mountains to find where X marks the spot.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Rocket Ski Rescue - Crusher’s Grammy is in town to watch Crusher and Blaze race at the Monster Dome. But when Crusher tries to cheat using rocket skis, his plan backfires, blasting him off the racetrack and across Axle City!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Comet Cupcakes / Tina's New Friend - The crew help Capt. Sprinkles find a flower to make his special cupcakes but when Escarlata steals it they must get it back.// While trying to stop Bonnie Bones, Tina accidentally gets separated and makes a new friend in the form of an ancient robot!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Busy Baby - Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Don't Yuck My Yum! - In the Gourmet Galaxy, everyone loves yummy food! But when General Yuck turns everything icky, only a recipe for delicious Moon Muffins can stop her. Master Chef Goby and his apprentice Deema must bake those muffins and save the galaxy!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Puppy Girl and Super Pup! - When supervillain Felina Meow starts turning all the dogs at the annual Dog Show into cats, it's up to superheroes Puppy Girl and Super Pup to stop her! Will they foil her cat-astrophic plan before she turns everyone's pups into kitties?!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep139
programme.desc: The Museum - Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep140
programme.desc: Very Hot Day - It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep141
programme.desc: Chloe's Puppet Show - Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep142
programme.desc: Daddy Gets Fit - Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep153
programme.desc: Smile Day - When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep154
programme.desc: No Panic ! - Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Kittens - Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Joshini The Amazing - Periwinkle is planning a magic show! The Amazing Joshini and YOU, are eager to perform the greatest magic trick the Blue's Clues house has ever seen! But which one? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Tow Truck Tough! - Blaze transforms into a tow-truck - and, with the help of AJ and Gabby, sets off on a tow-tally awesome adventure to save Stripes.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Parroting Pups / Merpups Save the Turbots - Rocky loses his voice and can’t bark out his puppack tools, but Matea the parrot has no problem doing it for him. // The Magical Mer Moon means the Merpups are back, only this time they’re helping the PAW Patrol on a rescue.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep323
programme.desc: Pups Save the Gliding Turbots / Pups Save a Plane - Francois & Cap'n Turbot become stranded on a remote island,Ryder and the pups fly in to find and rescue the cousins. // It's a double daring mid air rescue as Mayor Goodway's first flying lesson goes sideways,the Pups make sure everyone lands safely.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Jump up & get down / What's up Lola - It's Deer Squad to the rescue when Stu and Safia bounce off to space on their super bouncy mega trampolines./ A bad mood crystal causes Lola and many animals to become unusually grumpy!Jade has to help Deer Squad to restore joy around Central Forest.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Lady Monkey mech - Sir Steel wrecks havoc during Harvest Parade so Lady Fluffpot can shop in peace. Can Deer Squad save the parade?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football - Paddington rescues Pancake Day after Mrs. Bird hurts her arms snowboarding and can't make pancakes. // Jonathan teaches Paddington football, but Paddington kicks the ball into Mr. Curry's garden. They decide to get it back by climbing over the fence.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Paddington and The Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a box of Magic tricks, but Paddington cannot master the tricks until he learns to practice, practice, practice. // Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep244
programme.desc: The Toy Cupboard - Peppa and George's toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys. Mummy Pig orders a new toy cupboard, but it needs to be assembled – and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not good at DIY.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep232
programme.desc: Ice Skating - Peppa and George are going ice-skating for the first time. Mummy Pig teaches Peppa to skate and soon she is having lots of fun. Peppa begins to teach George how to skate but it turns out he is a natural born skater. Peppa and George love ice-skating.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep229
programme.desc: Painting - Peppa and George are painting. Daddy shows them how to mix paints and the three of them paint a beautiful picture of a cherry tree. Everything is going very well, until the ducks turn up and decide to run through the paint and all over the painting.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Whistling - Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep226
programme.desc: The Eye Test - Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision – but that doesn’t stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep326
programme.desc: Digging Up the Road - Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks are in the way.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep224
programme.desc: The Balloon Ride - Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school: a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Swimming - Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. Rebecca Rabbit is there too. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to discover that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving. Very good indeed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep213
programme.desc: The Time Capsule - Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rongisõit - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Teddy's Day Out - Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zoë Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When it’s home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep248
programme.desc: Bouncy Ball - Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets. She uses the bouncy ball to play a game of tennis with Peppa, making George feel left out. Will the job of ball boy cheer him up?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Bubbles - Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water. Then he makes a big, muddy, bubbly puddle for everyone to jump up and down in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S04 Ep408
programme.desc: T-Rex Trouble - Blaze and Zeg are in Dinosaur Valley, showing off their amazing robot powers to their dinosaur friends. But when they discover three lost little Tyrannosauruses, they must use their robot powers to get the babies home safely.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The Time Capsule / Hiccup Soup - Santi and crew get magically transported to the past, where they team up with young Abuelo to get back to the present! // When faced with a case of magical hiccups, Santi and his crew must collect ingredients to make the cure-all Hiccup Soup.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Detective Baby Shark - When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep705
programme.desc: Pups Save a Waiter-Bot / Pups Stop a Pie-Clone - Mr. Porter's high tech waiter robot helps around the café, but it can't stop cleaning! It's up to the Pups to clean up the mess all over town! // Mayor Humdinger creates a cyclone of delicious pies! The Pups must stop it before the town is covered.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt - Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm. // There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep502
programme.desc: The New House - Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Mysteries - The family is watching “Detective Potato” on TV. Peppa and George want to be detectives too. So,Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George use a magnifying glass to follow a trail of cake crumbs to solve the mystery

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Polly's Holiday - Granny and Grandpa’s pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep152
programme.desc: School Play - Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Musical Instruments - Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig find a box of instruments in the attic, and Peppa and George try them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Flying a Kite - Peppa and George go outside to fly their kite, but the kite gets stuck in a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Shopping - Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Hiccups - George gets hiccups when he drinks his juice too quickly, so Peppa tries to cure him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep143
programme.desc: Tidying Up - Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Mummy Pig at Work - Peppa accidentally crashes Mummy Pig's computer, so Daddy Pig tries to fix it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep135
programme.desc: Camping - Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Playgroup - Peppa and George are going to daycare. It's George's first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep119
programme.desc: New Shoes - Peppa loses her shoes, but she gets new red ones. Now she is so happy in them, that she refuses to take them off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit in Space - Grampy Rabbit visits Peppa's playgroup to talk about space rockets. The talk is going very well until suddenly Grampy Rabbit looses his voice. Can Doctor Brown Bear get him talking again?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep133
programme.desc: Cleaning the Car - Peppa and her family have to wash the car when it gets dirty.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep252
programme.desc: Stars - It is night time and the sky is full of stars. Mummy and Daddy Pig let Peppa and George put their coats on and they go outside to look at the stars. The stars look very tiny, but when Peppa and George look through a telescope the stars look bigger.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep131
programme.desc: Ballet Lesson - Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Dressing Up - Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep123
programme.desc: The New Car - The family car breaks down, so Peppa and her family rent a new one, but it starts acting crazy

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep243
programme.desc: School Camp - Peppa and her friends are going camping with Madame Gazelle. When it gets dark, they all sing a song around the campfire. When it is time for bed, Peppa and her friends get a little scared and all the children end up sleeping in Madame Gazelle’s tent

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On / Detective Baby Shark - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Den Build Disaster/Winter Lights - Kai tries to impress with his super den, but his leaf blower invention frightens the baby animals. // Lola's plan to help a family of hedgehogs over the winter doesn't go to plan when Sir Steel wants to brighten things up.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Paddington Makes a Scrapbook / Paddington Digs a Tunnel to Peru - Paddington decides to make a scrapbook of memories and tries to include all his friends to show Aunt Lucy. // Paddington decides to dig a Tunnel through the centre of the earth to Peru but ends up in Mr. Curry's green house.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Paddington The Table Tennis Champ! - Paddington & Mateo form a table tennis team and the beat the table hogs so everyone can play!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Dinosaur Parade - Blaze, AJ, and lots of spectators have gathered to watch herds of dinosaurs march through Axle City! But Crusher pushes his way into the parade, scattering dinos everywhere. It's up to Blaze, AJ, and Zeg to find and rescue them!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Pickle Power - Crusher builds a super-powered vacuum to clean up his big mess – but the machine goes haywire, sucking up Crusher and everything in its path! Now Pickle must team up with Blaze and AJ to stop the vacuum and save Crusher.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep103
programme.desc: To The Lighthouse / The Golden Giant - When a storm blows out the lighthouse light, Santi and crew hurry to guide Mami and Abuelo back from sea. // When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep619
programme.desc: The Fastest Feather Race! - In the Fastest Feather in the Race, it's Team Flightless versus cocky Amelia the Peregrine Falcon. Though Penguin Nonny, Ostrich Oona, and Kiwi Goby can't fly, these birds of a feather flock together! Will teamwork be enough to win the trophy?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep620
programme.desc: The Solar Light Spectacular! - When giant robot Buster steals all the batteries that power Solar City, which runs on the sun's energy, it's up to Solar Power Workers Nonny and Goby to stop him and get the lights back on before the big light show is cancelled!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep93
programme.desc: Cold - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po are outside in the cold when they spot the Tiddlytubbies who are warm, inside. The Teletubbies put on hats, gloves and scarves to keep warm.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S1) Ep18
programme.desc: Beans - Dee encourages a friend to say beans and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep35
programme.desc: How I Roll - Tinpo and his problem-solving crew help Delivery Po transport her delicate cargo down a bumpy road.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep10
programme.desc: It's time to look at old pictures - A photo of Gran Gran and JoJo's mummy when she was a little girl inspires them to take a walk and compare old photos of their neighbourhood to see how it has changed over time.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep65
programme.desc: Cousin Flora - Monty becomes confused when playing with his cousin Flora when he learns that they play differently to one another.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep64
programme.desc: Car Trip - Monty is surprised that his mum doesn't find her job exciting, and wonders if things become dull if you do them every day.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep6
programme.desc: Stumpfest - Dad and his mates hit the backyard, ready to rip up some tree stumps! But when Bluey and Bingo take over a stump as a nail salon, Dad finds he's got some negotiating to do.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep28
programme.desc: The Sheep Badge - The Squirrels are playing with their toys when they notice that there is a sheep in the clubhouse. Wait a minute! There are sheep everywhere! How did that happen?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep27
programme.desc: The Hide And Seek Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels decide to play Hide and Seek. They've hidden in really good places, but Duggee finds everyone except Roly... Where could he be?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep26
programme.desc: The Tinsel Badge - It's nearly Christmas, so while Duggee wraps presents to go under the tree he asks the Squirrels if they want to decorate the clubhouse.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep47
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Symbiosis Shrink Down - The Go Jetters learn about 'symbiosis' - when two different animals or plants help each other.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep46
programme.desc: Mission Manatee, USA - The Go Jetters are in the Gulf of Mexico to learn about Manatees, peaceful water mammals that spend most of their time either sleeping or eating sea-grass.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep5
programme.desc: Hairdressers - During a game of hairdressers, Bluey discovers that big-headed customer Dad has nits! To help treat them Bingo has to find her voice, while Bluey has to find her ears.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep4
programme.desc: Squash - When dad and Uncle Stripe play a game of squash, Bluey and Bingo are in control of their every move, and Bingo proves that big siblings don't always beat little siblings.

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Leaellynasaura and Egg - Andy creates an exhibition about the dinosaurs of Australia, and meets a mother leaellynasaura when he travels back 106 million years in time.

programme.title: My Pet and Me: Teeny Tiny Creatures (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: Earthworms - Ferne visits a worm farm, while Rory and Sandy learn why worms are amazing soil engineers.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S4) Ep26
programme.desc: Time Capsule Treasure Chest - Captain Captain tries to collect pieces of treasure that have been left around the place. She orders Cook and Line to take the treasure and lock it away in her treasure chest.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep25
programme.desc: The Balloon Badge - Duggee blows up some balloons for Tino the artistic mouse's birthday, but the squirrels are worried because Tino can be grumpy.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep24
programme.desc: The Acorn Badge - Norrie is upset when she sees a leaf fall from the tree, because she thinks it's broken.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep23
programme.desc: The Raindance Badge - When Duggee's flowers look very sad, everyone does a rain dance to help make it rain.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep45
programme.desc: Endangered Species, São Paulo, Brazil - The Go Jetters are upset after hearing of the species that need help. Ubercorn tries to cheer them up by planning a visit to the forests of Sao Paulo.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep44
programme.desc: Cave Train Trouble, Slovenia - Glitch has taken Tala on holiday to Slovenia's Postojna Caves, and she is looking forward to finding a rare creature called an olm for her class project. Ubercorn and Lars join them.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S15) Ep10
programme.desc: Let It Snow - Gordon and Thomas collect logs for an animal shelter and sing a tune about snow in the hope they can make snow clouds appear.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep28
programme.desc: Pillow Fill - Scarf Lady helps Sarah & Duck catch the fluffs and puffs to refill their pancaked pillows.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep27
programme.desc: Perimeter Pals - Sarah, Duck & Bug set off on a big adventure, through uncharted territory, as they attempt to cycle all the way around the park.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: Moon Path - On a cloudless night, Nelly and Nora help Mrs. Bonner search for her cat Morris.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) Ep28
programme.desc: Dog Loves Calm - Dog and Pug escape a very noisy Bookshop to find Granny Pug who is leading a mediation retreat. They are trying to find a peaceful spot.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep63
programme.desc: Fun With Clouds - A family trip for Monty is ruined by the cloudy weather, and they all wish they would disappear, until Monty and Jimmy take another approach.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: The Thing That Was Cosy - Tony finds a soft, warm spot to fall asleep on, and Gwen and Bob struggle to wake him back up again.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep34
programme.desc: Grow With the Flow - When some flowers pop-up near Tinpo HQ, there are too many for Logi-Po to water!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep35
programme.desc: How I Roll - Tinpo and his problem-solving crew help Delivery Po transport her delicate cargo down a bumpy road.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: Featherwand - Bluey and Mum are off to Chloe's party and Bingo isn't invited. But armed with a magic featherwand that makes things incredibly heavy, Bingo can now stop them leaving the house.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep22
programme.desc: The Maze Badge - Duggee's workshop needs cleaning, so the squirrels try to help him - but they end up building a maze around Duggee!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep21
programme.desc: The Hiccup Badge - The Squirrels meet a little worm who has swallowed a bit too much earth and has got the hiccups.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep20
programme.desc: The Same Badge - As Peggee and the Hummingbirds journey up the river to deliver a parcel, they have fun spotting and avoiding the wildlife that they meet along the way.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep43
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Dream Team Trouble - After Glitch accidentally destroys part of the Academy, he and Ubercorn have a huge argument. When he heads to Grim HQ to make amends, Ubercorn is accidentally trapped.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep42
programme.desc: Floating Farms, Bangladesh - Glitch's trip to a funky floating farm becomes a rescue mission on a fast-flowing river.

programme.desc: Sr. 8 - Guest Presenter Kerry Staight travels to Pinnaroo in South Australia, a town that is putting the health and happiness of its people above everything else.

programme.title: Wang Gungwu Lecture 2023
programme.desc: Australian Children's Laureate and author/illustrator Gabrielle Wang delivers the Wang Gungwu Lecture, where we invite prominent Chinese-Australians to speak about their life and work, as part of Lunar New Year celebrations.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep30
programme.desc: Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep2
programme.desc: With cost of living pressures increasing after eight consecutive interest rate rises, there's never been a more important time to keep track of your money. Rachel Pupazzoni looks at the week in business, finance and markets.

programme.title: The World Ep30
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: The School That Tried To End Racism Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - In a program aimed at stopping racism in its tracks, a class of 9 to 11-year-old students explore the impact of racism, and the complexities of identity and representation in history and in pop culture.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep30
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News. We've got more reporters in more places, connecting communities and covering the stories and issues that matter to you. Presented by Michael Tetlow.

programme.title: The Drum Ep15
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's lives everyday, encouraging thoughtful and challenging debate with a diverse panel. Presented by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier and John Barron.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep30
programme.desc: Follow the story with the latest on the day's events, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe uncovering what you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep40
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC274OliveiravsGaethje
programme.desc: Two titles were on the line at UFC 274 as Charles Oliveira faced off against Justin Gaethje and Rose Namajunas took on Carla Esparza in a rematch of their Ultimate Fighter Finale bout. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep10
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: 2022 Grand Prix of Qatar Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The fabulous Lusail International Circuit lies on the outskirts of Doha, the capital city of Qatar. Built in little over a year, the track cost $58 million USD and required round-the-clock dedication from almost 1,000 workers in order to get it ready for the inaugural event - the Marlboro Grand Prix of Qatar on the 2nd October 2004. The track itself is a flowing layout of 5.4 kilometres, surrounded by artificial grass designed to prevent sand from the neighbouring desert from blowing onto the circuit. The main straight is over a kilometre in length and there is a good mix of medium and high-speed corners, including a couple of quick left-handers which has proved particularly popular with the riders.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2248
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Lewis vs. Spivac
programme.desc: Prelims - After quietly working his way up the heavyweight ranks, Moldova’s Serghei Spivac smashed his way into the Top 15 with finishes of Greg Hardy and Augusto Sakai, and now the “Polar Bear” aims for even greater heights when he faces the UFC’s Knockout King, Derrick Lewis, in the main event of UFC Fight Night on February 5 at the APEX in Las Vegas. One of the best heavyweights of his era, Lewis has sent top prospects like Chris Daukaus and Curtis Blaydes crashing to defeat, and he has similar plans for Spivac in this pivotal showdown
